description.en: Refers to the social phenomenon in mainland China from the 1950s to the 1980s where peasants and others left their registered residences to seek a living in other areas, especially large cities.

description.zh-cn: 在庐山会议上，因坚持支持彭德怀，周惠被停职批评。
description.en: At the Lushan Conference, Zhou Hui was suspended from his duties and criticized for his steadfast support of Peng Dehuai.

description.zh-cn: 在1959年庐山会议上，周惠与时任湖南省委第一书记周小舟一同坚持支持彭德怀。
description.en: At the 1959 Lushan Conference, Zhou Hui, along with then Hunan Provincial Party First Secretary Zhou Xiaozhou, jointly insisted on supporting Peng Dehuai.

description.zh-cn: 在1959年庐山会议上，周惠坚持支持彭德怀的观点。
description.en: At the 1959 Lushan Conference, Zhou Hui insisted on supporting Peng Dehuai's views.

description.zh-cn: 毛泽东将周惠从“彭黄张周周”反党集团名单中划掉，使其免于被划为反党集团成员。
description.en: Mao Zedong removed Zhou Hui's name from the list of the 'Peng-Huang-Zhang-Zhou-Zhou' anti-Party clique, thus sparing him from being labeled a member of the anti-Party clique.

description.zh-cn: 周惠在担任中共内蒙古自治区党委第一书记期间提出的一些政策，引发了1981年内蒙古学生运动。
description.en: Some policies proposed by Zhou Hui during his tenure as First Secretary of the CPC Inner Mongolia Autonomous Region Committee triggered the 1981 Inner Mongolia student movement.

description.zh-cn: 周惠在内蒙古主政期间提出“外省区人口盲流流入内蒙古不要堵，要妥善安置”的政策，促进了外省人口流入内蒙古。
description.en: During his administration in Inner Mongolia, Zhou Hui proposed the policy that "the blind flow of population from other provinces into Inner Mongolia should not be blocked, but should be properly settled," which promoted the influx of population from other provinces into Inner Mongolia.

description.zh-cn: 周惠在中共湖南省委第一书记（代理）的职务由张平化接任。
description.en: Zhou Hui was succeeded by Zhang Pinghua as the First Secretary (Acting) of the CPC Hunan Provincial Committee.

description.zh-cn: 周惠接替尤太忠担任中共内蒙古自治区党委第一书记。
description.en: Zhou Hui succeeded You Taizhong as the First Secretary of the CPC Inner Mongolia Autonomous Region Committee.

description.zh-cn: 周惠在中共内蒙古自治区党委第一书记的职务由张曙光接任。
description.en: Zhou Hui was succeeded by Zhang Shuguang as the First Secretary of the CPC Inner Mongolia Autonomous Region Committee.
